title: 16 - Faith and Doubt
description:
In this episode we talk about what faith is not, Peter Gabriel, remember how great it IS to have a VCR in your Ford Excursion, and offer clarity to biblical doubtfulness.

- Mike Erre

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com
